title: The Golden Calf
summary: Exodus 32 recounts how the Israelites, impatient for Mosesâ€™ return, create a golden calf to worship. God is angered, and Moses intercedes for the people. Moses destroys the idol and confronts the sin with justice.

faq.question: Why did the Israelites make a golden calf?
faq.answer: They grew impatient waiting for Moses and wanted a visible god to lead them.

faq.question: How did Moses respond?
faq.answer: He destroyed the calf, confronted Aaron, and called those loyal to the Lord to act against the sin.
